fields.name: GroupDN
fields.description: This specifies the group DN, which overrides the base DN for group lookups.

fields.name: GroupMembershipFilter
fields.description: This specifies the custom LDAP search filter to be used when looking up group membership from LDAP server.

fields.name: UserDN
fields.description: This specifies the user DN, which overrides the base DN for user lookups.
